name: mircinv
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpbiri(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1), wceq(c1, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1))
-| wceq(c1, c1)
-| wi(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1), wceq(c1, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1))
-| wceq(c1, c1)
-| wi(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1), wceq(c1, c1)))

|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1), wceq(c1, c1)))

stmt.origin: mirinv(c0, c1, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
stmt.pretty: mirinv(c0, c1, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1), wceq(c1, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(clng, c3))
-| wceq(c7, cfv(cmir, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c7, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(clng, c3))
-| wceq(c7, cfv(cmir, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c7, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)= c1)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
⊣ c6 =(LineG ` c3)
⊣ c7 =(pInvG ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ c0 =(c7 ` c1)

comment: The center point is invariant of a point inversion. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Aug-2019.)
